Card.Name: Goblin Lackey
Card.RulesText: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

Card.Name: Akki Blizzard-Herder
Card.RulesText: When Akki Blizzard-Herder dies, each player sacrifices a land.

Card.Name: Mogg War Marshal
Card.RulesText: Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

Card.Name: Tuktuk the Explorer
Card.RulesText: Haste When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, create Tuktuk the Returned, a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token.

Card.Name: Goblin Sharpshooter
Card.RulesText: Goblin Sharpshooter doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever a creature dies, untap Goblin Sharpshooter. {T}: Goblin Sharpshooter deals 1 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Ball Lightning
Card.RulesText: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

Card.Name: Goblin Ringleader
Card.RulesText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Card.Name: Lightning Dragon
Card.RulesText: Flying Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) {R}: Lightning Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Siege-Gang Commander
Card.RulesText: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Goblin Grenade
Card.RulesText: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin. Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Lightning Bolt
Card.RulesText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Aether Vial
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

Card.Name: Meekstone
Card.RulesText: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

Card.Name: Winter Orb
Card.RulesText: As long as Winter Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than one land during their untap steps.

Card.Name: Earthquake
Card.RulesText: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

Card.Name: Goblin Bombardment
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Boggart Shenanigans
Card.RulesText: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

Card.Name: Rishadan Port
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Tap target land.

Card.Name: City of Traitors
Card.RulesText: When you play another land, sacrifice City of Traitors. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

Card.Name: Wasteland
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.
